meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>weekday</kanji> <kanji>day</kanji> is the <vocabulary>day of the week</vocabulary>, as in "Monday" or "Tuesday." You'll be learning those on level 18, but first you should learn 曜日 to get you prepared.
readingMnemonic: This word uses the on'yomi reading for 曜 and the kun'yomi reading for 日. You've learned both of these already, but be careful because ひ of 日 changes to び here.
